base_description: White plastic latch with a sleek, elongated shape.
part_description: Consists of a main body with a circular knob, a rectangular base, and a small, protruding peg. The knob is positioned near one end, while the peg is centrally located on the base.
internal_interaction_description: The circular knob and peg work together to secure the latch in place. The knob rotates or slides to engage with the peg, ensuring stability. The main body provides structural support, allowing the parts to function as a cohesive unit.
external_interaction_description: The latch can be attached to doors or windows, interacting with frames to secure them. Users rotate or slide the knob to open or close, providing a locking mechanism. It interacts with external elements by ensuring safety and security in household or industrial settings.
